Title: Silverlight CRM SOAP Library
Description: SilverCrmSoap is a library built using the methods in the walkthrough to use the SOAP Endpoint for Web Resources with Silverlight to simplify Silverlight development for CRM 2011, providing a set of tools to make writing SOAP based Silverlight applicaiton for CRM easier and quick
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SilverCrmSoap is a library built using the methods in the walkthrough to use the SOAP Endpoint for Web Resources with Silverlight to simplify Silverlight development for CRM 2011, providing a set of tools to make writing SOAP based Silverlight applicaiton for CRM easier and quick

The SilverCrmSoap Library contains 3 helpers, the XrmHelper, the FormHelper, and the SoapHelper.
